title: Custom Entity
description: Models a named custom entity (i.e. name of a person, place, or organization) used in a piece of content.

_id.description: The unique ID for this entity.

custom_id.description: A unique identifier for a custom-defined entity.

label.description: The actual string of text that was identified as a named entity.

type.description: A description of what the named entity is. E.g. 'organization', 'person', or 'location'.

score.description: The score assigned to this entity between 0 and 1, where 1 is an exact match.
